Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.lab1.database.Connection

  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    class responsible for connection with a database and all entity menager-related methods

    1.0
    Author:
    Dominika Bieg

        public Client readClient(int client_id)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Method which finds and reads entity from a client table. In case of not having a given entity in database, throws an exception;
        Parameters:
        client_id - - id of client to be returned
        Returns:
        client object, which was found in a database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case of not having the client in a database

        Returns:
        ordercl object, which was found in a database
        Throws:
